segments.text: Have you applied for you visa to go to study in the united states yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I handed in my application form two weeks ago and I ’ m going for an interview next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good luck ! I ’ Ve heard it ’ s very difficult to get a visa to go to the united states .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The application form are quite complicated . It took me a few hours to fill it out . The hardest thing was getting all the necessary documents . That took almost two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of documents did you need to present ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had to show document relating to my financial status and of course my education , because I want a student visa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you think so many people have their applications rejected ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that they don ’ t complete the forms correctly or they don ’ t include all the required documents . The embassy is very strict about it . You have to be quite careful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are they stricter with Chinese people than with other nationalities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s simple . Many people break the rules regarding their visa conditions .
segments.speaker: S2
